doc:
Marcelle Corday https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcelle_Corday 0 Marcelle Corday (January 8, 1890 – June 25, 1971) was a Belgian-born American actress. She mostly played character parts in silent and sound films. Officially, her American film career began in 1925, but it is claimed she played a small role, uncredited, in Fred Niblo's 1924 film, The Red Lily being menaced by Dick Sutherland in a bar. Marcelle_Corday ( January_8_,_1890 – June_25_,_1971 ) was a_Belgian-born_American_actress . She mostly played character_parts in silent_and_sound_films . Officially , her_American_film_career began in 1925 , but it is_claimed she played a_small_role , uncredited , in Fred_Niblo 's_1924_film , The_Red_Lily being_menaced by Dick_Sutherland in a_bar .
